description: "This mid-18th century map of Southeast Asia includes written notes on goods produced and traded, geographical features, and wild animals found in each part of the region. The cartouche features a drawing of Asia with people, fields and palm trees."
title: "A new and accurate map of the East India Islands. [map] : Laid down according to the latest discoveries, and agreeable to the most approved maps & charts. The whole being regulated by astron. observations."
